===Overview===
The '''Tribe of Fire''' are a [[Homo sapiens|Human]] hunter-gatherer society from the [[Savage Land]].{{r|Wolverine: The Jungle Adventure Vol 1 1}}

===Events===
While based in [[Australia]], a man asked [[James Howlett (Earth-616)|Wolverine]] to go to the Savage Land, where he encountered a tribe of humans. Arriving in a lightweight plane, the tribe believed him a god, with the exception of [[Gahck (Earth-616)|Gahck]], the tribe's female chieftain. Gahck challenged Wolverine to combat, and once it was established that he wasn't a god, he offered to help their hunting parties. Logan subsequently started a relationship with Gahck. When members of the tribe were captured, Wolverine discovered that a robotic [[Tyrannosaurus rex]] would attack the tribe and take their members to a secret base. Wolverine discovered that experiments were performed on the tribe members by [[Apocalypse (Android) (Earth-616)|Apocalypse]], and after freeing himself and the captured Gahck, he battled Apocalypse, though it turned out to be an android. In the android's lab, Logan learned that [[En Sabah Nur (Earth-616)|Apocalypse]] was the man who had told him to journey to the Savage Land in the first place. Cyborgs resulting from the experiments ultimately rejoined the tribe.{{r|Wolverine: The Jungle Adventure Vol 1 1}}
